title: So Aatrox can revive with Grievous Wounds applied to him
body:
If you apply Grievous Wounds perfectly, as in in between the cleansing of debuffs on the revive and the application of the untargetability, you can actually make him revive with (whats supposed to be) 18% health (but I had visage) instead of 30%.

http://i.imgur.com/MyFGHnw.gifv

replies.body: Making him revive with Grievous Wounds will reduce the amount he recovers from 30% max HP to 18%. (20% with spirit visage) With the fact that 30% is bad enough, imagine reviving with even less.
